name: KONGEER
description:
Tribute to the arcade games of the early eighties (Popeye, Donkey Kong..). 1 or 2 players. Great difficulty and addiction as in the games of the past, but with a control more in line with current times.
Help Sir Redhood and Sir Greenstone rescue the princess from the clutches of Kongeer.

* 10 Stages.
* Retro.
* Eighties difficulty and addiction.
* Varied enemies and traps.
* Solo and cooperative.
* High score.
